titleStmt.title: Modern church-musick pre-accus'd, censur'd and obstructed in its performance before His Majesty, Aprill 1, 1666 vindicated by the author, Matt. Lock ...
titleStmt.author: Locke, Matthew, 1621 or 2-1677.

notesStmt.note: The Nicene Creed and the reponses to the Ten Commandments, for four-part a capella voices.
Place and date of publication from Wing.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
